alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 2:48PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson, northeastern Leon, southeastern Grady and southwestern Thomas Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 248 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Thomasville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fincher, Moncrief, Festus, Jarrott, Beachton, Miccosukee, Metcalf and Lake Miccosukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
